_sText:
**NOTE:** This is a deathmatch version of the map. There are no bombsites, or hostages. Alternate versions of this may be coming soon.

Creator Comment
====================
> I would say... "This is simply a remake of cs_crackhouse..." but this project took A LOT longer than I had anticipated. I wanted it to be as far from crackhouse as possible, when it came to physical appearance. While at the same time, I was very cautious about maintaining the original, key aspects of the map. I really do hope you all enjoy this map. It was a lot of hard work, but I'm glad it's finally finished!
============

**UPDATE (Nov, 24th 2014)**
- Fixed custom content implimentation.
- Removed broken Cube Mapping.
- Used default Cube Mapping.

**UPDATE (Nov, 22nd 2014)**
- Changed mapname from _cs_ to _dm_ to avoid any further confusion.
- Expanded buy zones to avoid not spawning in a buy zone.
- Attempted HDR Cube Mapping.
- Ambient Lighting raised by **10** points.

**POSSIBLE FUTURE PLANS**
- Bombsite Version
- Hostage Rescue Version
